long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Temple Run 2 is an exhilarating game available as a Chrome Extension that you can also play for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. In this fast-paced endless running game, you find yourself exploring ancient temple ruins while being chased by demonic monkeys.

The objective of Temple Run 2 is to navigate through treacherous paths, jump over obstacles, slide under barriers, and collect valuable artifacts and coins along the way. As you progress, the speed of the game increases, adding to the challenge and excitement.

The game features stunning graphics, immersive sound effects, and smooth controls, allowing you to swipe and tilt your device to perform various actions. You can unlock different characters with unique abilities, power-ups, and upgrades to enhance your gameplay and increase your chances of survival.

With its addictive gameplay and endless challenges, Temple Run 2 offers a thrilling experience that will keep you engaged for hours. So, visit the website and embark on an epic adventure as you try to escape the clutches of the relentless monkeys in this popular Chrome Extension game.
